channel.title: <HELP> 508 Servers woulnt run on Ubuntu for me
channel.description:
<HELP>Hello im new to private servers on UBUNTU LINUX Ok btw I have Ubuntu Maverick Meerkat
I think I have a 3.1.2 server but it doesn't have what I want like the houses and GE and stuff. So I downloaded a 5.0.8 source and I just can't get it to work! Could someone link a better server thats completed that has the stuff I want (Houses, and GE) it doesn't have to have the GE but i'd like to have it.
I get this when I run run.cmd but i changed it to run.sh [code]austin@Austin-Ubuntu:~/Documents/Palidino76s_508_Servers/Server 508/cmd$ sudo ./run.sh cd: 1: can't cd to ../bin Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: palidino76/rs2/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: palidino76.rs2.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: palidino76/rs2/Server. Program will exit. [/code] Heres whats in run.sh
[code]"/usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun/bin/java" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594[/code]
Thanks

item.title: <HELP> 508 Servers woulnt run on Ubuntu for me
item.dc:creator: @fookenmonkey fookenmonkey
item.description:
@fookenmonkey wrote:

Hello im new to private servers on UBUNTU LINUX
Ok btw I have Ubuntu Maverick Meerkat

I think I have a 3.1.2 server but it doesn’t have what I want like the houses and GE and stuff. So I downloaded a 5.0.8 source and I just can’t get it to work! Could someone link a better server thats completed that has the stuff I want (Houses, and GE) it doesn’t have to have the GE but i’d like to have it.

I get this when I run run.cmd but i changed it to run.sh

austin@Austin-Ubuntu:~/Documents/Palidino76s_508_Servers/Server 508/cmd$ sudo ./run.sh cd: 1: can't cd to ../bin Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: palidino76/rs2/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: palidino76.rs2.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: palidino76/rs2/Server. Program will exit.
Heres whats in run.sh

Thanks
